data.content:
Installer flow now uses raw GitHub install script to download prebuilt release runtime artifact (no local clone/build), installs launcher on PATH, and supports app lifecycle commands via launcher. README documents first-run command and upgrade path.
Integrated to origin/main in commit 5bfcfbc (2026-02-16).
Post-release validation: public installer command from README was executed against v0.1.0 artifact () and succeeded end-to-end with foolery start/status/stop and log file output.
Validation detail: install was run with FOOLERY_RELEASE_TAG=v0.1.0 using the raw installer URL from README.
Correction: installer/launcher no longer require Bun for runtime; installs now run as Node-based app from release artifact.
